Introducing the Round Table

Empowering communities with urbanized tourism

We drive economic self-reliance by strategically leveraging urbanization to develop tourism models that empower communities to own their future.

The Problem

Despite abundant cultural and natural resources, many African communities remain financially dependent due to underdeveloped tourism frameworks and limited strategic urbanization.

The Solution

We create innovative, sustainable tourism models that leverage urbanization to empower communities to build self-reliant, thriving local economies.

Simple tourism models,

empowered communities,

lasting economic freedom.

E-Lab Challenges

Our E-LAB journey, helped us understand communities better and develop solutions that create real impact.

Meet the Round Table

Introducing our think tank team and sharing fun insights about who we are and what drives us

Discover Africa

Exploring a specific African community to understand its way of life and the challenges it faces through creative storytelling

Help-LAB

Engaging with our community to design impactful solutions that improve quality of life and create meaningful change

Hunt for Treasure

Interviewing a local leader to learn about their project or organisation and gathering insights to shape our own entrepreneurial journey

Launch Your Mission V2

Clarifying our mission, problem, and solution, then crafting a compelling pitch to present who we are, what we solve, and why we need funding

Bringing Our Solution to Life

Community-Owned

Empowers local communities to manage and benefit directly from tourism activities.

Scalable Design

Adapts to different regions with minimal adjustments for local contexts.

Sustainable Growth

Ensures environmental, cultural, and economic sustainability long-term.

Driving Community Based Tourism
